rook.api.transport

Interface Serializer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type that will be serialized into a buffer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CapsSerializer, IOValueSerializer, IOValuesSerializer, StringSerializer

    public interface Serializer<T>
    Interface for a class that can serialize a generic type into a buffer
    Author:
    Eric Thill
